org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap

类 AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S extends State,SD extends StateDescriptor<S,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap.AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    SV - The type of the values in the state.
    S - The type of State
    SD - The type of StateDescriptor for the State S
    所有已实现的接口:
    State, InternalKvState<N>
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractHeapMergingState, HeapFoldingState, HeapMapState, HeapValueState

    public abstract class AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S extends State,SD extends StateDescriptor<S,?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InternalKvState<N>
    Base class for partitioned ListState implementations that are backed by a regular heap hash map. The concrete implementations define how the state is checkpointed.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected N currentNamespace
      The current namespace, which the access methods will refer to.
      protected TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer 
      protected TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer 
      protected SD stateDesc
      This holds the name of the state and can create an initial default value for the state.
      protected StateTable<K,N,SV> stateTable
      Map containing the actual key/value pairs.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明

      Creates a new key/value state for the given hash map of key/value pairs.

      • AbstractHeapState

        protected AbstractHeapState(SD stateDesc,
                            StateTable<K,N,SV> stateTable,
                            TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                            TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer)
        Creates a new key/value state for the given hash map of key/value pairs.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state. This contains name and can create a default state value.
        stateTable - The state tab;e to use in this kev/value state. May contain initial state.

      • getSerializedValue

        public byte[] getSerializedValue(byte[] serializedKeyAndNamespace)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: InternalKvState
        Returns the serialized value for the given key and namespace.

        If no value is associated with key and namespace, null is returned.

        指定者:
        getSerializedValue 在接口中 InternalKvState<N>
        参数:
        serializedKeyAndNamespace - Serialized key and namespace
        返回:
        Serialized value or null if no value is associated with the key and namespace.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions during serialization are forwarded
